commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas9829fd0"

diff:
"9829fd0 fix for bug #396689:  double entity view.columns.label in places.dtd fix for bug #396920:  Invalid accesskeys for Show Columns and Sort in the Places Organizer patch=Ehsan Akhgari <ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com> r=sspitzer
diff --git a/browser/locales/en-US/chrome/browser/places/places.dtd b/browser/locales/en-US/chrome/browser/places/places.dtd
index 9fa0167..18f8c7c 100644
--- a/browser/locales/en-US/chrome/browser/places/places.dtd
+++ b/browser/locales/en-US/chrome/browser/places/places.dtd
@@ -12,9 +12,9 @@
 <!ENTITY view.toolbar.label             "Toolbar">
 <!ENTITY view.toolbar.accesskey         "o">
 <!ENTITY view.columns.label             "Show Columns">
-<!ENTITY view.columns.accesskey         "S">
+<!ENTITY view.columns.accesskey         "C">
 <!ENTITY view.sort.label                "Sort">
-<!ENTITY view.sort.accesskey            "s">
+<!ENTITY view.sort.accesskey            "S">
 <!ENTITY view.unsorted.label            "Unsorted">
 <!ENTITY view.unsorted.accesskey        "U">
 <!ENTITY view.sortAscending.label       "A > Z Sort Order">
@@ -181,7 +181,6 @@
 <!ENTITY view.details.accesskey    "D">
 
 <!ENTITY view.addons.label   "Get View Add-ons">
-<!ENTITY view.columns.label  "Columns">
 
 <!ENTITY maintenance.label   "Import and Backup">
 
"
